name: Claw Enforcement
description:
This game was made in the context of the GB Studio Jam 2020 hosted by KocianTech. The theme was Christmas cat. It is my first time working with the GB Studio, it was a lot of fun and stress, but a yet satisfying experience.

The game is about a cat that needs to retrieve the stolen catnip for their Christmas party. Have fun with many cat related puns. 

Controls
  1. Left - Left Arrow / A 
  2. Right - Right Arrow / D 
  3. A - Alt / Z / J - To interact 
  4. B - Ctrl / K / X  - To jump
